fields.summary: Titanium  Android and ios build error
fields.environment: OSX Mavericks node.js 0.10.26  CLI version 3.2.1 Titanium SDK version 3.2.0GA

comments.body:
Please provide the output of the following command :

titanium info

Also, can you please let us know your operating system language? For some members changing the operating system language to ENGLISH resolves the issue.

Thank you Ritu Agrawal,


I changed operating system language to English.this solve my issue for ios. 
but Android Gives this error

[ERROR] :  Emulator exited with error: 1
[ERROR] :  PANIC: Could not open: Nexus 4
[ERROR] Application Installer abnormal process termination. Process exit value was 1


Thank you

The error you are seeing occurs after you update the latest Android SDK-tools  22.6.1.

This is a duplicate of TIMOB-16640 and that ticket has been resolved and the fix now available in 3.2.3 release. 

Related blog post : 
http://www.appcelerator.com/blog/2014/03/updating-to-android-22-6-1-tools/
Resolving it as a duplicate of TIMOB-16640.
